Uses of Package
FoxRabbit

Classes in FoxRabbit used by FoxRabbit
AbstractBoard
          An abstract class that holds the common characteristics between the different implementations of the board.
Animal
          Grouping superclass that is used to combine common and related behavior and attributes need by the Fox and rabbit classes.
Fox
          Fox class represents the logic provided by the fox to search and traverse the rabbit over the board.
Fox.Observation
          A composite class to hold the representation of the observation needed for the movement of the fox
FoxRabbitUI
          Graphical representation of the game manipulated by arrays data structures Works as a view and controller of that manipulates the model layer of abstraction The class is internally implemented to oscillate between the windows as the state pattern to provide one window handling to all user actions without the need to external dialogues
Loader
           
Loader.CompositeClass
          Grouping class that holds the needed data to the construction class(es)
Rabbit
          Class to represents the motion of the rabbit around the array and mainly controlled by the game player through the user interfacing --> mainly escaping from foxes the min number needed to win
